name: PAT_ACCT_CVG
description: The PAT_ACCT_CVG table contains information about a patient�s accounts and coverages. The table will contain one record for each account for a patient. The record will also contain the patient�s primary coverage for that account.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number. A patient id can be associated with multiple rows of accounts and coverages.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique account record ID for an account associated with this patient. This ID number may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Category value associated with the type of account, such as Personal/Family, Worker�s Comp, etc.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ACTIVE_YN
columns.description: Is the account active at the time of the extract: Y or N.

columns.name: FIN_CLASS_NAME
columns.description: The financial class category number for the patient's primary coverage on the account.  If there is no coverage, it is the account's financial class.
entries: Sent to Consolidated Self-Pay Service Area

columns.name: GUAR_PAT_REL_NAME
columns.description: Relation between the guarantor and patient.

columns.name: ACCT_COMMENT
columns.description: Free text comment associated with this account.

columns.name: ACCT_PRIM_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique system Identifier of the patient's primary Claim.
